= Tiny Playground ðŸ§¸

Welcome to our sandbox page where you can try out `ðŸ§¸ Tiny` online! `ðŸ§¸ Tiny` is a lightweight game engine that allows you to create 2D games with ease.

With our sandbox page, you can experiment with the engine's features and get a feel for how it works.

Whether you're a seasoned game developer or just starting out, our sandbox page is the perfect place to test out `ðŸ§¸ Tiny` and see what it can do. So come on in, play around, and let your creativity run wild!

Need help? xref:index.adoc[Check out the documentation]!

++++
<tiny-editor style="display: none;" sprite="resources/tiny-dungeon.png">
function _init()

end

function _update()

end

function _draw()

end
</tiny-editor>
++++

== Examples

- Every examples from xref:index.adoc[the documentation] can be tweaked in this sandbox.
- https://minigdx.github.io/tiny/sandbox.html?[Tracking the player mouse]
- https://minigdx.github.io/tiny/sandbox.html?[Waving letters]
- https://minigdx.github.io/tiny/sandbox.html?[AABB Collision]
- https://minigdx.github.io/tiny/sandbox.html?[Control sprite move]
- https://minigdx.github.io/tiny/sandbox.html?[Bouncing Bat]
- https://minigdx.github.io/tiny/sandbox.html?[Perlin and dither]
